label: 院
本: Terms and Concepts in Japanese Medieval History . Journal of Japanese Studies . 1983
説明文: In the late Heian and Kamakura periods, a retired tennō; the palace of a retired tennō or court lady; an imperial temple; a territorial unit (as in Iriki-in of Satsuma). (See Mass, Kamakura Bakufu) [天皇、入来院、薩摩］
